entry.title: Demo
entry.content: Code12345678910#include<iostream>using namespace std; int main(){ int a,b; a = 1; b = 2; if(a > b) cout << "Good!" << endl ; return 1;} Equation\sum_{i=0}^{n} i^2 = \sum_{i=0}^{n} \frac{n(n+1)(2n+1)}{6} $ \int_{0}^{\infty} e^{-x^2}dx = \frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2} $ This is a blue line! Italics
